name: Venus
tagline: Life for a pair of veteran actors gets turned upside down after they meet a brash teenager.

name: Squanto: A Warrior's Tale
tagline: Historically inaccurate chronicle of Squanto's life prior to and including the arrival of the "Mayflower" in 1620.

name: Harsh Times
tagline: A tough-minded drama about two friends in South Central Los Angeles and the violence that comes between them.

name: Atlas Shrugged II: The Strike
tagline: Railroad owner Dagny Taggart and steel mogul Henry Rearden search desperately for the inventor of a revolutionary motor as the U.S. government continues to spread its control over the national economy.

name: Fifty
tagline: A showcase of skiing exploits.

name: Robot & Frank
tagline: Set in the near future, an ex-jewel thief receives a gift from his son: a robot butler programmed to look after him. But soon the two companions try their luck as a heist team.

name: Veronica Mars
tagline: Years after walking away from her past as a teenage private eye, Veronica Mars gets pulled back to her hometown - just in time for her high school reunion - in order to help her old flame Logan Echolls, who's embroiled in a murder mystery.

name: Last Ounce of Courage
tagline: The son of a fallen soldier, years after his father's death, tries to reconnect with his grandfather, who is still grieving the loss of his child.

name: Stand Up Guys
tagline: A pair of aging stickup men try to get the old gang back together for one last hurrah before one of the guys takes his last assignment - to kill his comrade.

name: Ghost Dog: The Way of the Samurai

production.name: Arbeitsgemeinschaft der öffentlich-rechtlichen Rundfunkanstalten der Bundesrepublik Deutschland (ARD)

tagline: An African American mafia hit man who models himself after the samurai of old finds himself targeted for death by the mob.

name: Art School Confidential
tagline: Starting from childhood attempts at illustration, the protagonist pursues his true obsession to art school. But as he learns how the art world really works, he finds that he must adapt his vision to the reality that confronts him.

name: Thirteen Conversations About One Thing
tagline: In New York City, the lives of a lawyer, an actuary, a house-cleaner, a professor, and the people around them intersect as they ponder order and happiness in the face. of life's cold unpredictability.

name: Rize
tagline: Rize chronicles a dance movement that rises out of South Central Los Angeles with roots in clowning and street youth culture.

name: Mrs Dalloway
tagline: In 1923 London, socialite Clarissa Dalloway's well-planned party is overshadowed by the return of an old suitor she had known 33 years earlier.

name: Pinocchio and the Emperor of the Night
tagline: Pinocchio and his friends, a glow worm and a marionette, search for a magic music box. However, so is the evil Scalawag and the Emperor of the Night.

name: The Fifth Estate
tagline: A dramatic thriller based on real events that reveals the quest to expose the deceptions and corruptions of power that turned an Internet upstart into the 21st century's most fiercely debated organization.

name: You Will Meet a Tall Dark Stranger
tagline: Sally's parents' marriage breaks up when her father undergoes a mid-life crisis and impulsively weds a prostitute as Sally's own marriage also begins to disintegrate.

name: A Smile Like Yours
tagline: Greg Kinnear plays a carriage-shy husband in a romantic comedy about a couple trying to conceive a child.

name: Carrington
tagline: Period piece. Very visually beautiful. The relationship dynamics are compelling and insightful.

name: Catfish
tagline: Young filmmakers document their colleague's budding online friendship with a young woman and her family which leads to an unexpected series of discoveries.

name: Water
tagline: The film examines the plight of a group of widows forced into poverty at a temple in the holy city of Varanasi. It focuses on a relationship between one of the widows, who wants to escape the social restrictions imposed on widows, and a man who is from the highest caste and a follower of Mahatma Gandhi.

name: Pi
tagline: A paranoid mathematician searches for a key number that will unlock the universal patterns found in nature.

name: Another Year
tagline: A look at four seasons in the lives of a happily married couple and their relationships with their family and friends.

name: Anything Else
tagline: A contemporary romantic comedy set in New York city about the relationship between an older guy and his younger protege. The older guy guides the younger through a messy and hilarious love story.

name: The Limey
tagline: An extremely volatile and dangerous Englishman goes to Los Angeles to find the man he considers responsible for his daughter's death.

name: The Skin I Live In
tagline: A brilliant plastic surgeon, haunted by past tragedies, creates a type of synthetic skin that withstands any kind of damage. His guinea pig: a mysterious and volatile woman who holds the key to his obsession.

name: Silent Fall
tagline: An autistic boy witnesses his parents' double murder. Richard Dreyfuss as a controversial therapist, seeks to probe the child's mind in order to solve the case.

name: The Cat's Meow
tagline: Semi-true story of the Hollywood murder that occurred at a star-studded gathering aboard William Randolph Hearst's yacht in 1924.

name: Crumb
tagline: An intimate portrait of the controversial cartoonist and his traumatized family.

name: Grizzly Man
tagline: A devastating and heartrending take on grizzly bear activists Timothy Treadwell and Amie Huguenard, who were killed in October of 2003 while living among grizzlies in Alaska.

name: Rude Awakening
tagline: In the 1960s, two hippies go off into the jungle to evade the FBI. When they come back to New York in the 1980s, their fellow hippie friends have become rich yuppies.

name: Resurrecting the Champ
tagline: Up-and-coming sports reporter rescues a homeless man ("Champ") only to discover that he is, in fact, a boxing legend believed to have passed away. What begins as an opportunity to resurrect Champ's story and escape the shadow of his father's success becomes a personal journey as the ambitious reporter reexamines his own life and his relationship with his family.

name: Crash
tagline: After getting into a serious car accident, a TV director discovers an underground sub-culture of scarred, omnisexual car-crash victims who use car accidents and the raw sexual energy they produce to try to rejuvenate his sex life with his wife.

name: I've Loved You So Long
tagline: A woman struggles to interact with her family and find her place in society after spending fifteen years in prison.

name: Clerks.
tagline: A day in the lives of two convenience clerks named Dante and Randal as they annoy customers, discuss movies, and play hockey on the store roof.

name: The Big Kahuna
tagline: Two veteran salesman dissect a sales pitch to a particular client, through their young protege.

name: Clue
tagline: Six guests are invited to a strange house and must cooperate with the staff to solve a murder mystery.

name: Two Lovers
tagline: A Brooklyn-set romantic drama about a bachelor torn between the family friend his parents wish he would marry and his beautiful but volatile new neighbor.

name: The Naked Cage
tagline: A young woman is falsely convicted of a bank robbery and sent to a maximum-security prison run by a corrupt warden, where she is forced to suffer various indignities.

name: Maurice
tagline: After his lover rejects him, a young man trapped by the oppressiveness of Edwardian society tries to come to terms with and accept his sexuality.

name: Capturing the Friedmans
tagline: Documentary on the Friedmans, a seemingly typical, upper-middleclass Jewish family whose world is instantly transformed when the father and his youngest son are arrested and charged with shocking and horrible crimes.

name: Wordplay
tagline: An in-depth look at The New York Times' long-time crossword puzzle editor Will Shortz and his loyal fan base.

name: Elvis Gratton II: Miracle à Memphis
Raiders of the Lost Ark
tagline: Archeologist and adventurer Indiana Jones is hired by the US government to find the Ark of the Covenant before the Nazis.

name: The Thing
tagline: Scientists in the Antarctic are confronted by a shape-shifting alien that assumes the appearance of the people that it kills.

name: Feeling Minnesota
tagline: An ex-convict and his bumbling crook brother fight for the same woman.

name: Supercross
tagline: Faced with the suspicious death of their father, two brothers must motivate one another to get back on their bikes and take the Las Vegas Motocross Championships by storm.

name: Soul Survivors
tagline: A co-ed is caught between the world of the living and the dead.

name: Girl Happy
tagline: A Chicago mobster hires a rock and roll singer and his band to keep an eye on his daughter during Spring Break in Fort Lauderdale, Florida.

name: Celeste & Jesse Forever
tagline: A divorcing couple tries to maintain their friendship while they both pursue other people.

name: The Ex
tagline: A slacker is forced to work for his father-in-law after his pregnant wife steps away from her high-paying job.

name: Synecdoche, New York
tagline: A theatre director struggles with his work, and the women in his life, as he creates a life-size replica of New York City inside a warehouse as part of his new play.

name: The Lunchbox

production.name: National Film Development Corporation of India (NFDC)

tagline: A mistaken delivery in Mumbai's famously efficient lunchbox delivery system connects a young housewife to an older man in the dusk of his life as they build a fantasy world together through notes in the lunchbox.

name: 8 Women
tagline: One murdered man, eight women, each seeming to be more eager than the others to know the truth. Gimme, gimme, gimme some clues to make up my mind. And eventually enter the truth. Oh, thou cruel woman!

name: Zindagi Na Milegi Dobara
tagline: Three friends decide to turn their fantasy vacation into reality after one of their number becomes engaged.

name: Chloe
tagline: A doctor hires an escort to seduce her husband, whom she suspects of cheating, though unforeseen events put the family in danger.

name: Jawbreaker
tagline: Three of the most popular girls at Reagan High accidentally kill the prom queen with a jaw-breaker when a kidnapping goes horribly wrong.

name: The Public Eye
tagline: Story of a 1940s photographer who specializes in crime and in not getting involved... until this time.

name: Sunshine State
tagline: A woman and her new husband returns to her hometown roots in coastal northern Florida, and must deal with family, business, and encroaching real estate development.

name: Beautiful
tagline: Mona sacrifices everything, including family, in pursuit of a beauty pageant victory. Her friend Ruby helps her to an amazing degree.

name: The Widow of Saint-Pierre
tagline: In a small French colony, a drunken man kills someone. While a guillotine is being shipped in, he changes, becoming a good and popular man.

name: The Wild Parrots of Telegraph Hill
tagline: A homeless musician finds meaning to his life when he starts a friendship with dozens of parrots.

name: Illegal Tender
tagline: When the thugs who killed his father come looking for him, a young Latino man and his mother flee from their home.

name: The Band's Visit
tagline: A band comprised of members of the Egyptian police force head to Israel to play at the inaugural ceremony of an Arab arts center, only to find themselves lost in the wrong town.

name: Heavenly Creatures
tagline: Two girls have an intense fantasy life; their parents, concerned the fantasy is too intense, separate them, and the girls take revenge.

name: Jab Tak Hai Jaan
tagline: After finding and losing his true love in London, Samar Anand defies death by becoming a bomb disposal expert for the Indian Army. Returning to London after 10 years, he suffers amnesia after an accident. Will he be reunited with his love?

name: Paid in Full
tagline: A young man from Harlem, forced to cope with the 1980s drug scene, builds an illegal empire, only to have a crisis of conscience.

name: The House of Mirth
tagline: A woman risks losing her chance of happiness with the only man she has ever loved.
